meanings.definition: A bulbous plant of the lily family, with straplike leaves and a compact spike of bell-shaped fragrant flowers.
meanings.sent1: In the garden, the hyacinths bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I planted some hyacinths near the window for their lovely scent.
meanings.sent3: The bees danced around the hyacinths, enjoying their sweet perfume.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like the fragrance of hyacinths.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the hyacinths brightened up the entire yard.

meanings.definition: A plant of the lily family, with straplike leaves and a compact spike of bell-shaped fragrant flowers.
meanings.sent1: Each spring, the hyacinths bring a burst of color to the garden.
meanings.sent2: The hyacinths in the vase perfumed the whole room.
meanings.sent3: The hyacinths whispered secrets to the tulips in the flower bed.

meanings.sent5: The gentle breeze carried the scent of hyacinths through the open window.
